# FAQ 

## Why set an upstream branch for a local branch? 

- Can use short hand commands `git push` and `git pull` without specifying `origin <branch>` 
- Git can inform on uncyned commits which haven't been pushed/pulled yet 

[Source: Tower - Set Upstream](https://www.git-tower.com/learn/git/faq/set-upstream)  
[Source: Stackoverflow - why use `--set-upstream`](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/37770467/why-do-i-have-to-git-push-set-upstream-origin-branch)
